name: vscode-workspaces
title: VS Code Workspaces
description: Quickly browse, open, and manage your VS Code workspaces from Raycast.

commands.name: index
commands.title: VS Code Workspaces
commands.description: Search and open your VS Code workspaces instantly.
commands.subtitle: Workspace Browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: yugveer_wadzatia
